author: beth kress
comment: android wear app states there is a settings app available for this face but just brings back to face download...a settings app is a great idea for all watch faces! Time out settings, date, etc...
title: Love design...needs fine tuning

author: Ted Miller
comment: Uses 27% of battery,, according to Battery Mix. Had to put watch on the charger twice today. Attractive design.
title: Poor battery life

author: Steve Meder
comment: And I'd pay to get customization options.
title: Awesome look

author: Steven York
comment: It was my fav watch face. I had to return my Moto 360 and I got Asus Zenwatch instead. Any chance of a square version of this for my new watch? Would love to use it again.
title: Love it!!!
